Text: Re Random questionsIndeed I am whipping up a meal for a lil lady I think Ill just go ahead and buy a pyrex I should probly have one thanks though Im not quite sure how it came to be this way but Im doing it at my house instead of hers So I have a HUGE chore to prepare the casa before tomorrow night Ive already banished Nels to Tatias place Ah yes the brewery picture Boy did I feel BAD bad that day I really had JUST woken up for that Ya maybe Friday we can keep in touch RAP Original Message From To Sent Monday June AM Subject RE Random questions Yo Yes I believe your typical campells will have little mushroom pieces in it And kmart would be a good place to buy a pyrex dish glass bakingof course you could borrow any supplies from me any time Are you cooking up some grub for a lil lady I heard you all had a great time Saw the pic of you that john said you woke up for at the brewery Maybe we all can get together for a brew before john and i are off for alaska on sunday we will be gone for a week and a half Maybe friday after work Let me know if you have any other cooking qs Mo Original Message From Robert A Parry MS DABMP ENRON Sent Monday June AM To Sanchez Monique Subject Random questions Hey Momar Did you have a peaceful week We had a blast Ive got a couple of Qs for ya Does cream of mushroom soup have actual mushroom pieces in it And where would be a good place to buy a glass bakingcasserole dish Thanks Robbie
